title: Timeline
description: Here we can see how my career has progressed over the years

epitech.title: Epitech
epitech.description: Epitech is a french school that teaches computer science. It's a new way of learning, based on project and teamwork

gencovery.title: Gencovery
gencovery.description: Gencovery is a french startup that aim to help biocompanies to find the best solution for their needs. It aims to reduce cost and time of research

nftluck.title: NFTLuck
nftluck.description: NFTLuck aimed to be the first NFT Casino. It's a project that never really took off, but I learned a lot about blockchain and NFTs

boheme.title: Boheme
boheme.description: Boheme is a school project that aims to help people create perfect road trips. It's a full stack project that I worked on with 5 other people. It use artificial intelligence to create the perfect road trip

ganister.title: Ganister
ganister.description: Ganister is the first graph-based innovation platform for product lifecycle management. I started working as an intern and quickly became a full-time developer
